title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Cognitive Theory-Based Technology-Enhanced Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills

learning_goals: Learners can recall core vocabulary of the target language with 80% or higher accuracy using mobile-based cognitive training tools.
